016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.lang.reflect.Type;
025
026public class JsonNodeMessageReaderFactory
027        implements MessageReader.Factory {
028    private ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
029
030    @Override
031    public <T> MessageReader<T> newReader(Class<?> type, Type genericType, String mediaType) {
032        if (JsonNode.class.isAssignableFrom(type))
033            return (MessageReader<T>) new MessageWriterImplementation();
034        else
035            return null;
036    }
037
038    class MessageWriterImplementation
039            implements MessageReader<JsonNode> {
040
041        @Override
042        public JsonNode readFrom(InputStream entityStream) throws IOException {
043            try {
044                return objectMapper.readTree(entityStream);
045            } catch (Throwable e) {
046                throw new IOException(e);
047            }
048        }
049    }
050}
